original: zhi dang dul dga' zhi zhing dul ba'i yid ldan la //
analyzed: zhi dang dul dga' zhi zhing dul ba'i yid ldan la //
translated: They delight in peace and tranquility, their minds are peaceful and tranquil,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra bar snang mkha' dang mtshungs 'dra zhing //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra bar snang mkha' dang mtshungs 'dra zhing //
translated: They are like the realm of space, appearing like the sky,

original: tha ba'i dri ma rnam sbyangs lam rnams shes gnas pa'i //
analyzed: tha ba'i dri ma rnam sbyangs lam rnams shes gnas pa'i //
translated: Their stains of callousness are purified, they abide in the knowledge of the paths,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par rab la nyon //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par rab la nyon //
translated: Listen to the excellent, special conduct of the bodhisattvas!

original: bskal pa bye bar dge ba brgya stong rab bsags shing //
analyzed: bskal pa bye bar dge ba brgya stong rab bsags shing //
translated: For millions of eons, they accumulate hundreds of thousands of virtues,

original: sangs rgyas brgya stong drang srong chen po mchod byas te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas brgya stong drang srong chen po mchod byas te //
translated: They make offerings to hundreds of thousands of buddhas, to the great sages,

original: dbang sgyur rnams dang rang rgyal mtha' yas mchod byas nas //
analyzed: dbang sgyur rnams dang rang rgyal mtha' yas mchod byas nas //
translated: They make offerings to the powerful ones and to the limitless pratyekabuddhas,

original: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir byang chub sems skye'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir byang chub sems skye'o //
translated: And then they give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the benefit of all beings.🔽They have discipline, austerities, and endurance in difficult practices,

original: brtul zhugs dka' thub dka' spyad dul bzod ldan gyur la; ;khrel yod dpal gyi spyod ldan ye shes dge 'phags shing //
analyzed: brtul zhugs dka' thub dka' spyad dul bzod ldan gyur la; ;khrel yod dpal gyi spyod ldan ye shes dge 'phags shing //
translated: They have the conduct of the glory of conscience, and their wisdom and virtue are noble.

original: blo gros rig yangs sangs rgyas ye shes sems ldan gyi //
analyzed: blo gros rig yangs sangs rgyas ye shes sems ldan gyi //
translated: They have vast, aware intelligence, and their minds are set on the wisdom of buddhahood.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i stobs dang mnyam 'dra skye //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i stobs dang mnyam 'dra skye //
translated: The bodhisattvas who are equal to and resemble the strength of the Victorious Ones are born.

original: dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed mchod rab mchod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed mchod rab mchod pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to make offerings to all the Victorious Ones of the three times,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings tshad zhing rnams thams cad yongs su sbyong //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings tshad zhing rnams thams cad yongs su sbyong //
translated: They purify all the realms of the universe, as vast as space.

original: chos rnams thams cad ji snyed de dag mnyam rtogs pas //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ji snyed de dag mnyam rtogs pas //
translated: By realizing the equality of all phenomena,

original: 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du byang chub sems skye'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du byang chub sems skye'o //
translated: The mind of awakening arises in order to liberate beings.

original: gzhal yas sems skyes sa mchog rab tu thob gyur nas //
analyzed: gzhal yas sems skyes sa mchog rab tu thob gyur nas //
translated: Having attained the supreme bhūmi of the birth of the inconceivable mind,

original: sdig @230b pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab tu dga'//
analyzed: sdig @230b pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab tu dga'//
translated: In order to clear away all misdeeds, they are immaculate and delighted.

original: smon lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag bsags byas nas //
analyzed: smon lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag bsags byas nas //
translated: Having accumulated the power of aspirations and virtuous qualities,

original: snying rje brtse ldan sa yi gong ma yongs su gnon //
analyzed: snying rje brtse ldan sa yi gong ma yongs su gnon //
translated: They ascend to the higher bhūmis with compassionate love.

original: 'gro phyir byams sems tshul khrims thos dang yon tan ldan //
analyzed: 'gro phyir byams sems tshul khrims thos dang yon tan ldan //
translated: For the sake of beings, they possess love, discipline, learning, and qualities.

original: dri med dri bral rang bzhin yongs dag bsam pa yis //
analyzed: dri med dri bral rang bzhin yongs dag bsam pa yis //
translated: With a pure intention, stainless and immaculate by nature,

original: 'jig rten thams cad me gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad me gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas //
translated: They see that all worlds are ablaze with three fires

original: gsum pa rnams yangs blo yis 'gro ba'i don du gnon //
analyzed: gsum pa rnams yangs blo yis 'gro ba'i don du gnon //
translated: And ascend to the third bhūmi in order to benefit beings.

original: sdug bsngal mi rtag nad pa zug rngus mi bde ba'i //🔽khams gsum rtag tu sdug bsngal brgya yi me 'bar bas //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mi rtag nad pa zug rngus mi bde ba'i // khams gsum rtag tu sdug bsngal brgya yi me 'bar bas //
translated: The sick, suffering from pain, are impermanent and miserable.🔽The three realms are always burning with a hundred miseries.🔽

original: 'dus byas nyes mthong rgyal ba'i legs pa mngon mos shing //
analyzed: 'dus byas nyes mthong rgyal ba'i legs pa mngon mos shing //
translated: Seeing the faults of conditioned things, they aspire to the good of the victors.

original: ye shes 'od 'phro yangs ldan 'od 'phro yod pa gnon //
analyzed: ye shes 'od 'phro yangs ldan 'od 'phro yod pa gnon //
translated: “They have vast light rays of wisdom, and they outshine those with light rays.

original: dran dang blo ldan lam gyi ye shes thob gyur cing //
analyzed: dran dang blo ldan lam gyi ye shes thob gyur cing //
translated: They have mindfulness and intelligence, and they attain the wisdom of the path.

original: sa mchog de la sangs rgyas brgya stong bsnyen bkur nas //
analyzed: sa mchog de la sangs rgyas brgya stong bsnyen bkur nas //
translated: “Having served a hundred thousand buddhas on that supreme bhūmi,

original: mi yi gtso bo'i yon tan rtag tu dran byed cing //
analyzed: mi yi gtso bo'i yon tan rtag tu dran byed cing //
translated: they always remember the qualities of the chief among humans.

original: 'gro ba kun gyis thub dka' rgyal bar dka' ba gnon //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyis thub dka' rgyal bar dka' ba gnon //
translated: They outshine the world, which is difficult for the sages to conquer.

original: ye shes blo gros thabs dang shes rab blo dpyod pas //
analyzed: ye shes blo gros thabs dang shes rab blo dpyod pas //
translated: “With the wisdom of intelligence, methods, and insight,

original: 'gro don mtha' yas sna tshogs bya ba bstan byas shing //
analyzed: 'gro don mtha' yas sna tshogs bya ba bstan byas shing //
translated: they demonstrate the performance of the various kinds of infinite benefit for beings.

original: stobs bcu'i mchod pa sems can don rnams bsgrub byas te //
analyzed: stobs bcu'i mchod pa sems can don rnams bsgrub byas te //
translated: Having accomplished the benefit of beings through worshiping those with the ten powers,

original: mi skye mngon sum mtha' yas sa drug yongs su gnon //
analyzed: mi skye mngon sum mtha' yas sa drug yongs su gnon //
translated: they directly perceive the unborn and outshine the sixth bhūmi.🔽“They have the power of the wisdom of the Dharma and the power of the wisdom of samādhi.

original: 'jig rten kun tu 'gro bas shes dka' spyod byed cing //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun tu 'gro bas shes dka' spyod byed cing //
translated: “They are difficult to know because they move throughout the world,

original: bdag bral byed med yod dang med pa rnam bsal ba'i //
analyzed: bdag bral byed med yod dang med pa rnam bsal ba'i //
translated: They are free of self, they are not created, and they are beyond existence and nonexistence.🔽“The seventh ground is called Gone Far, because it is difficult to move past,

original: @231a *// rang bzhin stong chos yan lag bcu gnyis rab 'byung zhes //🔽phra zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa yongs su gnon //
analyzed: @231a *// rang bzhin stong chos yan lag bcu gnyis rab 'byung zhes // phra zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa yongs su gnon //
translated: And because it is subtle and sharp, and because it produces the twelve branches of the Dharma of emptiness.🔽“The eighth ground is called Immovable, because it is vast,

original: thabs dang shes rab sems yangs rab tu thob gyur cing //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab sems yangs rab tu thob gyur cing //
translated: And because it is the attainment of the mind of wisdom and method,

original: ring du song ba gdul dka' ring du song ba gnon //
analyzed: ring du song ba gdul dka' ring du song ba gnon //
translated: And because it is difficult to move past, and because it has gone far.🔽“The ninth ground is called Excellent Wisdom, because it is naturally disciplined and peaceful,

original: rang bzhin dul zhing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te //
analyzed: rang bzhin dul zhing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te //
translated: And because it has abandoned the many minds,

original: de nas nam mkha' 'dra ba'i mi g-yo yongs su gnon //
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' 'dra ba'i mi g-yo yongs su gnon //
translated: And because it is immovable like space.🔽“The tenth ground is called Cloud of Dharma, because it is the wisdom of the wise,

original: de la mkhas pa'i ye shes las rnams sna tshogs phyir //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa'i ye shes las rnams sna tshogs phyir //
translated: And because it is the arising of various activities,

original: zhi ba de las bslang zhing mi yi mchog tu bsnams //
analyzed: zhi ba de las bslang zhing mi yi mchog tu bsnams //
translated: And because it is the arising of peace, and because it is the supreme of humans.🔽“The eleventh ground is called Lotus Endowed, because it is endowed with the ten powers,

original: dbang bcu ldan zhing 'jig rten yang dag nyid dpyod pa'i //
analyzed: dbang bcu ldan zhing 'jig rten yang dag nyid dpyod pa'i //
translated: And because it is the nature of the world, and because it is the correct analysis,

original: rang bzhin chen po 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gnon //
analyzed: rang bzhin chen po 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gnon //
translated: And because it is the great nature, and because it is the going of the world.

original: 'di la shin tu phra bar 'jig rten kun dpyad cing //
analyzed: 'di la shin tu phra bar 'jig rten kun dpyad cing //
translated: “They examine the world in a very subtle way,

original: sems can thibs po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs las dpyad de //
analyzed: sems can thibs po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs las dpyad de //
translated: And examine the conduct of beings, their kleśas and karma.

original: de dag gdul ba'i spyod pas yon tan mang po gnon //
analyzed: de dag gdul ba'i spyod pas yon tan mang po gnon //
translated: They are endowed with the conduct of training them, and they attain many good qualities.

original: bde gshegs mdzod thob don gyi dam pa rab tu ston //
analyzed: bde gshegs mdzod thob don gyi dam pa rab tu ston //
translated: They attain the treasure of the sugatas and teach the highest meaning.

original: dkar chos rim gyis de 'dra'i spyod pa ldan gyur pas //
analyzed: dkar chos rim gyis de 'dra'i spyod pa ldan gyur pas //
translated: “They are endowed with that kind of conduct, and gradually they acquire

original: sa dgu'i bar du bsod nams ye shes tshogs thob cing //
analyzed: sa dgu'i bar du bsod nams ye shes tshogs thob cing //
translated: The accumulations of merit and wisdom up to the ninth bhūmi.🔽They attain the consecration of the wisdom and qualities of all the buddhas,

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dam mngon 'dod pa; ;ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las 'thob //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dam mngon 'dod pa; ;ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las 'thob //
translated: And they aspire to the ultimate supreme strength of the jinas.

original: brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa //
analyzed: brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa //
translated: “They attain the samādhis that are beyond number,

original: spyod yul shes pas chos nyid shes @231b yangs thob gyur nas //
analyzed: spyod yul shes pas chos nyid shes @231b yangs thob gyur nas //
translated: And they attain the vast knowledge of dharmatā through knowing the domain.

original: de yi rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur 'thob //
analyzed: de yi rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur 'thob //
translated: After that they attain the consecration of omniscience.

original: yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thob pas de mi sgul //
analyzed: yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thob pas de mi sgul //
translated: They attain the samādhi of the vast domain, and they are unshakable.

original: gang tshe de yis kun mkhyen dbang bskur thob pa'i tshe //
analyzed: gang tshe de yis kun mkhyen dbang bskur thob pa'i tshe //
translated: When he receives the consecration of the knowledge of all things,

original: padmo rgya chen rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa 'byung //
analyzed: padmo rgya chen rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa 'byung //
translated: a great lotus appears, adorned with all jewels.

original: de yi tshul mthun lus kyi dbus su gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi tshul mthun lus kyi dbus su gnas par 'gyur //
translated: In accord with his way of being, it is in the center of his body,

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskor de la lta zhing gnas //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskor de la lta zhing gnas //
translated: and he remains there, surrounded by the sons of the Victorious One, looking at them.

original: de yi 'od zer khrag khrig mtha' yas stong phrag mang //
analyzed: de yi 'od zer khrag khrig mtha' yas stong phrag mang //
translated: He has many quintillions of light rays,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang zhi bar byed //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang zhi bar byed //
translated: which pacify all the sufferings of beings in the ten directions.

original: mgo yi gtsug nas 'od zer bye ba stong byung zhing //
analyzed: mgo yi gtsug nas 'od zer bye ba stong byung zhing //
translated: From the crown of his head, ten billion light rays emerge

original: phyogs rnams kun gyi mi yi gtso bo'i 'khor du rgyu //
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun gyi mi yi gtso bo'i 'khor du rgyu //
translated: and go to the retinues of the lords of humans in all directions.

original: steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'od zer dra bar gnas //
analyzed: steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'od zer dra bar gnas //
translated: In the space above, the light rays form a net

original: sangs rgyas mchod phyir brtson par rgyal ba'i zhabs su 'dong //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchod phyir brtson par rgyal ba'i zhabs su 'dong //
translated: and go to the feet of the Victorious Ones, striving to make offerings to the buddhas.

original: de tshe rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang //
analyzed: de tshe rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang //
translated: At that time, the Victorious Ones and their bodhisattva sons

original: chos rab don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob par mkhyen //
analyzed: chos rab don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob par mkhyen //
translated: know that the bodhisattva has received the consecration in order to realize the Dharma.

original: mchod pa'i don du rgyal sras mtha' yas kun kyang 'ong //
analyzed: mchod pa'i don du rgyal sras mtha' yas kun kyang 'ong //
translated: And the infinite Bodhisattvas will come to make offerings.

original: de'i tshe kun mkhyen dbang bskur mi mchog mdzod spu nas //🔽dbang bskur 'od zer dam pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i tshe kun mkhyen dbang bskur mi mchog mdzod spu nas // dbang bskur 'od zer dam pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: At that time, the supreme human, the Omniscient One,🔽will emit many sublime light rays from his brow.

original: 'od zer mchog gis bskor cing spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub //
analyzed: 'od zer mchog gis bskor cing spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub //
translated: Surrounded by those supreme light rays, they will disappear into the crown of his head.

original: gang tshe rgyal mchog bu yi thu bo srid mchog la //
analyzed: gang tshe rgyal mchog bu yi thu bo srid mchog la //
translated: When the supreme king, the eldest son, is consecrated in the supreme existence,

original: dbang bskur zhing du sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur tshe //
analyzed: dbang bskur zhing du sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur tshe //
translated: and all the Buddhas consecrate him in the consecration ground,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kun nas g-yo bar @232a *//
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kun nas g-yo bar @232a *//
translated: the entire world in the ten directions will quake,

original: 'gyur // mnar med bar gyi sdug bsngal de tshe zhi zhing 'dug /
analyzed: 'gyur // mnar med bar gyi sdug bsngal de tshe zhi zhing 'dug /
translated: and the suffering in the Avīci hell will be pacified at that time.

original: gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur ba //
translated: When he is consecrated by the consecration of the Omniscient One,

original: de phyir mkhas pas chos sprin sa mchog thob ces bya //
analyzed: de phyir mkhas pas chos sprin sa mchog thob ces bya //
translated: the wise one attains the supreme stage, the Cloud of Dharma.

original: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i shes rgyud tshad med de //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i shes rgyud tshad med de //
translated: The mindstream of the wise one abiding in this is immeasurable,

original: sa rab 'di la gnas pa 'gro kun gtso yin no //
analyzed: sa rab 'di la gnas pa 'gro kun gtso yin no //
translated: and the one abiding in this excellent stage is the foremost of all beings.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yangs dang // sems can khams dang zhing dang chos khams yangs pa dang // grangs dang grangs med nam mkha'i khams kyi bar du ste //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yangs dang // sems can khams dang zhing dang chos khams yangs pa dang // grangs dang grangs med nam mkha'i khams kyi bar du ste //
translated: From countable to uncountable, up to the realm of space,

original: chos dbyings yangs pa thams cad ma nor khong du chud //
analyzed: chos dbyings yangs pa thams cad ma nor khong du chud //
translated: The vast realm of phenomena, all without error, is penetrated.🔽Abiding here, the greatly powerful one knows all emanated actions,🔽Likewise the blessings, the subtle wisdom of the Victorious Ones,🔽The secrets of the supreme among humans, the enumeration of eons,🔽The holding of world systems in a single hair tip,

original: 'di la gnas pa mthu chen sprul pa'i las kun dang // de bzhin byin rlabs rgyal ba'i ye shes phra ba dang // mi mchog gsang ba bskal pa'i grangs rnams shes bya dang // skra rtse gcig tu 'jig rten khams rnams gzung ba dang // mi yi gtso bo 'byung dang sku tshe 'tshang rgya dang //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa mthu chen sprul pa'i las kun dang // de bzhin byin rlabs rgyal ba'i ye shes phra ba dang // mi mchog gsang ba bskal pa'i grangs rnams shes bya dang // skra rtse gcig tu 'jig rten khams rnams gzung ba dang // mi yi gtso bo 'byung dang sku tshe 'tshang rgya dang //
translated: The arising of the foremost among humans, the lifespan, the attainment of buddhahood,

original: 'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan 'da' ba'i rnams //
analyzed: 'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan 'da' ba'i rnams //
translated: The turning of the sacred wheel, and the aspects of nirvana,

original: thams cad rab shes gong du rnam thar zhi ba dag /
analyzed: thams cad rab shes gong du rnam thar zhi ba dag /
translated: All are fully known, and beyond that, the peaceful liberations

original: sngan chad ma thob kun kyang de tshe rab tu 'thob //
analyzed: sngan chad ma thob kun kyang de tshe rab tu 'thob //
translated: That have not been attained before are all attained at that time.

original: 'di la gnas pa'i mthu che rgyal ba'i chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa'i mthu che rgyal ba'i chos kyi sprin //
translated: The power of those who are on this bhumi is great, like the Dharma cloud of the Victorious Ones.

original: thams cad khong du chud byed dran pas kun kyang 'dzin //
analyzed: thams cad khong du chud byed dran pas kun kyang 'dzin //
translated: They understand everything and hold it all in their memory.

original: klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya @232b mtsho 'dzin pa ltar //
analyzed: klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya @232b mtsho 'dzin pa ltar //
translated: Just as the ocean holds all the water that comes from the clouds of all the nagas,

original: de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos sprin char chen kun kyang 'dzin //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos sprin char chen kun kyang 'dzin //
translated: in the same way, the Dharma cloud of the Victorious Ones holds all the great rain of Dharma.

original: rgyal ba gcig las chos gang mthu chen nges thob pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba gcig las chos gang mthu chen nges thob pa //
translated: The Dharma that is obtained from a single Victorious One with great power🔽is not even a fraction of the Dharma that is obtained from a single bodhisattva.

original: de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gi sems can rnams //
analyzed: de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gi sems can rnams //
translated: Even if all the sentient beings in the infinite realms of the ten directions

original: thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang //
analyzed: thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang //
translated: were to become shravakas of the Sugata and hold the Dharma,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i grangs char nyer mi 'gro /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i grangs char nyer mi 'gro /
translated: they would not come close to the number of teachings that a bodhisattva hears.

original: ye shes spyod pa'i stobs kyis sngan chad spyad pa'i mthus //
analyzed: ye shes spyod pa'i stobs kyis sngan chad spyad pa'i mthus //
translated: Through the power of previously engaging in the conduct of wisdom,

original: skad cig yud tsam gcig tu khrag khrig zhing bkang zhing //
analyzed: skad cig yud tsam gcig tu khrag khrig zhing bkang zhing //
translated: in a single instant, they fill a quintillion realms

original: bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs nyon mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs nyon mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed //
translated: and bring down a rain of nectar that pacifies all afflictions.

original: de phyir rgyal bas 'di ming chos kyi sprin ces gsungs //
analyzed: de phyir rgyal bas 'di ming chos kyi sprin ces gsungs //
translated: Therefore, the Victorious One has said that this bhumi is called Dharma Cloud.

original: 'di gnas mthu chen lha yi 'jig rten gtsor gyur pa'i //
analyzed: 'di gnas mthu chen lha yi 'jig rten gtsor gyur pa'i //
translated: In this stage, the great abode, they become the chief of the world of gods,

original: phyogs rnams kun tu mi yi gtso bo'i yul yang ston //
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun tu mi yi gtso bo'i yul yang ston //
translated: And they also show themselves as the chief of humans in all the worlds.

original: rnam 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag du ma yang ston te //
analyzed: rnam 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag du ma yang ston te //
translated: They show many quintillions of emanations,

original: byang chub spyod pa de sems 'gro ba myos par 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub spyod pa de sems 'gro ba myos par 'gyur //
translated: And the beings who see the bodhisattva’s conduct become intoxicated.

original: mkhas pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom pa bor ba tsam //🔽sa dgu'i bar du gnas pas shes par mi nus na //
analyzed: mkhas pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom pa bor ba tsam // sa dgu'i bar du gnas pas shes par mi nus na //
translated: The wise ones in this stage, with each step they take,

original: sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi 'gyur smos ci dgos //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi 'gyur smos ci dgos //
translated: Cannot be known by those who are on the ninth stage, let alone by other beings.

original: dus gsum nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyis de bzhin no //
analyzed: dus gsum nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyis de bzhin no //
translated: It is the same for all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas of the three times.

original: 'di gnas thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun la ston //
analyzed: 'di gnas thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun la ston //
translated: In this stage they show the path to omniscience to all beings.

original: shes pa dus gsum kun tu thogs med zhi chos can //
analyzed: shes pa dus gsum kun tu thogs med zhi chos can //
translated: They have the quality of peace, unimpeded knowledge of the three times,

original: zhing rnams kun tu rgyas bkang chos rnams kun gyi bar //
analyzed: zhing rnams kun tu rgyas bkang chos rnams kun gyi bar //
translated: And they fill all the buddhafields with all the Dharmas.

original: rgyal @233a *// ba kun gyi yon tan brjod cing ston par byed //
analyzed: rgyal @233a *// ba kun gyi yon tan brjod cing ston par byed //
translated: They describe and show the qualities of all the buddhas.

original: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa sangs rgyas mchod byed cing //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa sangs rgyas mchod byed cing //
translated: The wise ones in this stage make offerings to the buddhas,

original: phyogs rnams kun tu zhing dang chos kyi dbyings bkang ste //
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun tu zhing dang chos kyi dbyings bkang ste //
translated: They fill all the directions with fields and the realm of reality

original: rgyal ba mngon du mchod pas mchod byed 'phrogs pa med //
analyzed: rgyal ba mngon du mchod pas mchod byed 'phrogs pa med //
translated: And make offerings to the Victorious Ones, without being attached to the act of offering.

original: yon tan kun ldan sa yi lha yi lha zhes bya //
analyzed: yon tan kun ldan sa yi lha yi lha zhes bya //
translated: They are called “gods of gods” on the ground of possessing all good qualities.

original: mkhas pa 'di gnas shes rab snang bas 'gro kun gyi //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'di gnas shes rab snang bas 'gro kun gyi //
translated: The wise ones who abide in this ground, with the light of their wisdom,

original: mun pa kun bsal chos kyi tshul yang rab tu ston //
analyzed: mun pa kun bsal chos kyi tshul yang rab tu ston //
translated: Clear away the darkness of all beings and teach them the way of the Dharma.

original: dbang phyug dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sel //
analyzed: dbang phyug dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sel //
translated: With the power of their excellent mastery, they clear away the desire of beings.

original: de bas rgyal sras nyon mongs sel la mkhas zhes bya //
analyzed: de bas rgyal sras nyon mongs sel la mkhas zhes bya //
translated: Therefore, the heirs of the victors are called “the wise ones who clear away the afflictions.”

original: 'di la gnas pa de dag khams gsum dbang phyug 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa de dag khams gsum dbang phyug 'gyur //
translated: Those who abide in this ground become masters of the three realms.

original: ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum po ston la mkhas //
analyzed: ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum po ston la mkhas //
translated: They know the way of wisdom and are skilled in teaching the three vehicles.

original: skad cig yud tsam gcig gis ting 'dzin gcig min 'thob //
analyzed: skad cig yud tsam gcig gis ting 'dzin gcig min 'thob //
translated: In a single instant, they attain more than one samādhi.

original: phyogs bcu kun tu rgyal ba'i dam pa gcig min ston //
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun tu rgyal ba'i dam pa gcig min ston //
translated: In every direction, they manifest more than one sublime Victorious One.

original: 'di ni bdag gis rgyal sras sa rnams mdor bstan gyi //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag gis rgyal sras sa rnams mdor bstan gyi //
translated: I have taught this ground of the heirs of the victors in brief;

original: rgya cher bskal pa brgya phrag stong gis bstan mi nus //
analyzed: rgya cher bskal pa brgya phrag stong gis bstan mi nus //
translated: It could not be taught in a hundred thousand eons.

original: yon tan 'di 'dra'i sangs rgyas ye shes sa 'di la //
analyzed: yon tan 'di 'dra'i sangs rgyas ye shes sa 'di la //
translated: The Buddha’s pristine wisdom, with such qualities,

original: gnas pa rtag tu ri yi rgyal po bzhin mi g-yo //
analyzed: gnas pa rtag tu ri yi rgyal po bzhin mi g-yo //
translated: Abides on this ground, always unwavering like the king of mountains.

original: rgyal sras thog ma gtsug lag kun gyis mi g-yo ste //
analyzed: rgyal sras thog ma gtsug lag kun gyis mi g-yo ste //
translated: The first of the Victor’s heirs is unshaken by all the treatises,

original: sman gyi rnam pa kun gnas ri rgyal gangs bzhin no //
analyzed: sman gyi rnam pa kun gnas ri rgyal gangs bzhin no //
translated: Like the king of mountains, Mount Meru, with all its medicinal plants.

original: tshul khrims thos pas gnyis pa spos ngad spos dang 'dra //
analyzed: tshul khrims thos pas gnyis pa spos ngad spos dang 'dra //
translated: The second is like a fragrant tree, with morality and learning;

original: rnam 'dal @233b me tog ji bzhin gsum pa shes par bya //
analyzed: rnam 'dal @233b me tog ji bzhin gsum pa shes par bya //
translated: The third is like a flower, to be understood in the same way.

original: lam la mos bzhin mi 'khrugs 'od 'phro thob pa ste //
analyzed: lam la mos bzhin mi 'khrugs 'od 'phro thob pa ste //
translated: The fourth is like a lamp, with devotion to the path;

original: drang srong gnas bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyi rten gyur pa'o //🔽gnod sbyin gnya' shing 'dzin bzhin bsam yas lnga pa thob //
analyzed: drang srong gnas bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyi rten gyur pa'o // gnod sbyin gnya' shing 'dzin bzhin bsam yas lnga pa thob //
translated: The fifth is like the abode of sages, the support of the wise.🔽The sixth is like the yakṣa pillar-bearer, attaining the inconceivable;

original: rta rna'i shing tog 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bras bu ste //🔽bdun pas 'dzin klu bzhin shes rab chen pos thob /
analyzed: rta rna'i shing tog 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bras bu ste // bdun pas 'dzin klu bzhin shes rab chen pos thob /
translated: The seventh is like the fruit of the horse-tooth tree, attaining the result.🔽The eighth is like the nāga-holder, attained through great wisdom;

original: khor yug dbang ldan bzhin du brgyad pa dbang can 'thob //
analyzed: khor yug dbang ldan bzhin du brgyad pa dbang can 'thob //
translated: The ninth is like the powerful Indra, attaining power.

original: dgu pa dri ma sel ba dpal can lha min bzhin //
analyzed: dgu pa dri ma sel ba dpal can lha min bzhin //
translated: The tenth is like the glorious remover of stains, like a demigod.

original: bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan ri rab lha gnas 'dra //
analyzed: bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan ri rab lha gnas 'dra //
translated: The tenth is like the abode of the gods on Mount Meru.

original: dang po smon lam sngon 'gro gong ma tshul khrims tshogs //
analyzed: dang po smon lam sngon 'gro gong ma tshul khrims tshogs //
translated: The first is the collection of former prayers, the second is the collection of morality,

original: gsum pa spyod pa'i yon tan bzhi pa gcig gi dngos //
analyzed: gsum pa spyod pa'i yon tan bzhi pa gcig gi dngos //
translated: The third is the collection of qualities of practice, the fourth is the collection of the single vehicle,

original: lnga pa dge mang drug pa shin tu zab pa'i dngos //🔽brgyad pa blo gros yangs pa kun tu gcig min rgyan //
analyzed: lnga pa dge mang drug pa shin tu zab pa'i dngos // brgyad pa blo gros yangs pa kun tu gcig min rgyan //
translated: The fifth is the collection of the many virtues, the sixth is the collection of the very profound,

original: dgu pa mkhas pa ye shes phra zhing zab dang ldan //🔽'gro rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon //
analyzed: dgu pa mkhas pa ye shes phra zhing zab dang ldan // 'gro rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon //
translated: The eighth is the collection of the vast intellect, the ninth is the collection of the ornament of the non-single,

original: bcu pa rgyal ba rnams las yang dag chos 'dzin te //
analyzed: bcu pa rgyal ba rnams las yang dag chos 'dzin te //
translated: The tenth is the collection of the true Dharma from the Victorious Ones.

original: rgyal sras spyod pa mi sgul rgya mtsho de 'dra'o //
analyzed: rgyal sras spyod pa mi sgul rgya mtsho de 'dra'o //
translated: The Victorious Offspring’s conduct is unshakable, like the ocean.

original: spyod pa bcu 'das thog ma'i sems rab skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: spyod pa bcu 'das thog ma'i sems rab skye bar 'gyur //
translated: Beyond these ten conducts, the first mind of enlightenment arises.

original: dka' thub brtul bas gnyis pa gsum pa bsam gtan gyis //
analyzed: dka' thub brtul bas gnyis pa gsum pa bsam gtan gyis //
translated: The second is through the practice of austerities, the third is through concentration,

original: dag pas bzhi pa shin tu byang bas lnga pa'o //
analyzed: dag pas bzhi pa shin tu byang bas lnga pa'o //
translated: The fourth is through purity, the fifth is through thorough purification,

original: drug pa rnon pos rtogs pa bdun pa mi phyed sa //
analyzed: drug pa rnon pos rtogs pa bdun pa mi phyed sa //
translated: The sixth is through sharpness, the seventh is through realization, the eighth is through indestructibility,

analyzed: brgyad pa mthu chen rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ldan pa yin // dgu la ye shes @234a *//

analyzed: ldan pas thibs po'i spyod pa shes //

analyzed: bcu la rgyal bas dbang bskur rgyal po dbang thob bzhin //

analyzed: yon tan rin chen dag pas de bzhin rim du 'phar //

analyzed: rnam shes gcig gis 'gro ba kun sems shes par rung //

original: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides in the dharmadhātu, which is without center or edge.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas med par spyod cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas med par spyod cing /
translated: He has no abode in all world systems.

original: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang gzugs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang gzugs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
translated: He has entered into the bodies and forms of all sentient beings.

original: blang ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: blang ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with the way of the Dharma of non-appropriation.

original: mi zad cing tha mi dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / khyu mchog gi mthu la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi zad cing tha mi dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / khyu mchog gi mthu la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: He has perfected the effortless abiding in the miraculous powers and the supreme strength of the inexhaustible and undifferentiated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva Samantabhadra is endowed with the realization of the dharmadhātu.

original: de ltar / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: de ltar / rigs kyi bu /
translated: Thus, son of noble family,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni blta na don yod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni blta na don yod pa'o //
translated: the bodhisattva Samantabhadra is one whose sight is meaningful.

original: mnyan @250a *// pa don yod pa'o //🔽bsnyen bkur byed pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan @250a *// pa don yod pa'o // bsnyen bkur byed pa don yod pa'o //
translated: His hearing is meaningful.🔽His service is meaningful.

original: bsam pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa don yod pa'o //
translated: His thoughts are meaningful.

original: rjes su dran pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa don yod pa'o //
translated: His recollection is meaningful.

original: de la dad par byas pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: de la dad par byas pa don yod pa'o //
translated: His faith in him is meaningful.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de ni mthong ba don yod pa'o //🔽thos pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de ni mthong ba don yod pa'o // thos pa don yod pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva Samantabhadra is one whose sight is meaningful.🔽His hearing is meaningful.

original: bsnyen bkur ba don yod pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur ba don yod pa'o //
translated: His service is meaningful.

original: bsam pa don yod pa'o //🔽rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa don yod pa'o // rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o //
translated: their thoughts are meaningful;🔽their aspirations are meaningful;

original: de la mos par byas pa don yod pa'o //🔽blta ba don yod pa'o //
analyzed: de la mos par byas pa don yod pa'o // blta ba don yod pa'o //
translated: their faith is meaningful;🔽their vision is meaningful;

original: brtags pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: brtags pa don yod pa'o //
translated: their investigation is meaningful;

original: btsal ba don yod pa'o //
analyzed: btsal ba don yod pa'o //
translated: their search is meaningful;

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni rjes su smon lam gdab pa don yod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni rjes su smon lam gdab pa don yod pa'o //
translated: and the bodhisattva Samantabhadra is meaningful.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Samantabhadra, together with the entire assembly of bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'dod cing thal mo sbyar te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'dod cing thal mo sbyar te /
translated: wishing to see the bodhisattva Samantabhadra, joined their palms

original: bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad brjod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad brjod do //
translated: and bowed to the Blessed One and the bodhisattva Samantabhadra, saying these words:

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: “Homage to all the buddhas!

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Samantabhadra!

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas, bowing down to them all!

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I bow down to the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' @250b kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' @250b kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the bhagavat said to the bodhisattva Samantanetra and the great assembly of bodhisattvas:

original: rigs kyi bu dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag /
translated: “Sons of family!

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshol la gsol ba thob cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshol la gsol ba thob cig /
translated: Bow down to the bodhisattva Samantabhadra and make requests to him.

original: phyogs thams cad du mngon du gyis la kun tu mig gi lus su byin gyis rlob ste /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du mngon du gyis la kun tu mig gi lus su byin gyis rlob ste /
translated: Make him manifest in all directions and bless him to be the body of Samantanetra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dmigs pa gyis la chos kyi dbyings thams cad mngon du bya ba'i sems kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyis te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dmigs pa gyis la chos kyi dbyings thams cad mngon du bya ba'i sems kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyis te /
translated: Focus on the bodhisattva Samantabhadra and bless him with a mind that manifests the entire dharmadhatu.

original: chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar khong du chud par gyis la /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar khong du chud par gyis la /
translated: Understand that all phenomena are free from desire.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / smon lam gcig par byung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / smon lam gcig par byung ste /
translated: The bodhisattva Samantabhadra and you have the same aspiration.

original: gnyis su med pa la mnyam par zhog la /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa la mnyam par zhog la /
translated: Rest in the nonduality of that.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus las mngon par byung bar byin gyis rlob ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus las mngon par byung bar byin gyis rlob ste /
translated: He will bless you to manifest all the worlds in your body.

original: dbang po tha mi dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bar gyis la kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun tu 'gro ba yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po tha mi dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bar gyis la kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun tu 'gro ba yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: You should follow him, whose senses are not separate, and you should purify the all-pervading aspiration of Samantabhadra, and then you will see the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de skad thos nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang bcas pas spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de skad thos nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang bcas pas spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Samantanetra, having heard this teaching of the Blessed One, bowed his head to the feet of the Blessed One and of the bodhisattvas, and

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la gsol ba btab bo //
translated: he supplicated the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dag @251a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dag @251a *//
translated: Those bodhisattvas

original: gis gsol ba btab ma thag tu /
analyzed: gis gsol ba btab ma thag tu /
translated: had just made their supplication

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba gang gis /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba gang gis /
translated: when at that time the bodhisattva Samantabhadra manifested the miraculous power of his liberation.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na gnas shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na gnas shing /
translated: All the bodhisattvas saw the bodhisattva Samantabhadra sitting on a lotus seat at the feet of the tathagata.

original: padmo'i stan la 'dug par mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus las kyang 'byung bar snang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa dag nas kyang 'ong bar snang ba dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang /
analyzed: padmo'i stan la 'dug par mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus las kyang 'byung bar snang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa dag nas kyang 'ong bar snang ba dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang /
translated: They saw him emanating from the bodies of the bodhisattvas in the retinue, coming from the infinite world systems, and perfectly displaying the lineage of buddhas one after another.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rab tu brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rab tu brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang /
translated: the deeds of all buddhas being proclaimed in all world systems; the display of all the conduct of bodhisattvas; the illumination of the path of omniscient wisdom; the display of all the miracles of bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba thams cad yang dag par brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i dus gsum rab tu ston pa de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu bstan to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba thams cad yang dag par brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i dus gsum rab tu ston pa de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu bstan to //
translated: the proclamation of all the power of the leaders of bodhisattvas; and the display of the immeasurable tathāgatas of the three times.

original: de @251b nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas dga' zhing mgu ste /
analyzed: de @251b nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas dga' zhing mgu ste /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Samantanetra and the entire assembly of bodhisattvas, having seen those miracles, were delighted and overjoyed.

original: yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas /
analyzed: yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas /
translated: and, being satisfied, they were very happy and joyful.

original: dmigs pa thams cad kyis btud pa'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal to //
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad kyis btud pa'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal to //
translated: After bowing to all the objects of worship, they bowed to the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas sprin gyi char stong phrag bcu mngon par bab par gyur pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas sprin gyi char stong phrag bcu mngon par bab par gyur pa 'di lta ste /
translated: At that time, by the blessing of the Buddha, by the aspiration of those bodhisattvas, and by the roots of virtue of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra, there fell a rain of ten thousand clouds, like this:

original: me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //🔽phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo // phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
translated: there fell a rain of clouds of various flowers;🔽there fell a rain of clouds of various garlands;

original: spos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //🔽spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
analyzed: spos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo // spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
translated: there fell a rain of clouds of various perfumes;🔽there fell a rain of clouds of various aromatic powders;

original: gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
analyzed: gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
translated: there fell a rain of clouds of various parasols;

original: na bza' sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //🔽rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
analyzed: na bza' sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo // rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
translated: a rain of various garments fell from clouds of various garments;🔽a rain of various ornaments fell from clouds of various ornaments;

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //🔽spos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo // spos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
translated: a rain of various jewels fell from clouds of various jewels;🔽a rain of various incenses fell from clouds of various incenses;

original: snam bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
analyzed: snam bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
translated: a rain of various cloths fell from clouds of various cloths;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //🔽rol mo brdung @252a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rnam pa drug tu g-yos so // rol mo brdung @252a *//
translated: inexpressibly many world systems shook in six ways;

original: ba dang / dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra mang po byung ngo //
analyzed: ba dang / dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra mang po byung ngo //
translated: all the sounds of musical instruments and songs were heard;

original: lha'i nga ro snyan pa mang po rab tu byung ngo //
analyzed: lha'i nga ro snyan pa mang po rab tu byung ngo //
translated: many divine voices were heard;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snang ba chen pos khyab par snang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snang ba chen pos khyab par snang ngo //
translated: inexpressibly many world systems were illuminated with a great light;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag par gyur to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag par gyur to //
translated: inexpressibly many world systems were purified;

original: ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud gsum rnam par zhi bar gyur to //
analyzed: ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud gsum rnam par zhi bar gyur to //
translated: The three continuums of the paths to the lower realms were completely pacified.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par dag par gyur to //🔽byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs par gyur to /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par dag par gyur to // byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs par gyur to /
translated: Innumerable worlds became pure.🔽Innumerable bodhisattvas entered the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yongs su grub par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yongs su grub par gyur to //
translated: Innumerable bodhisattvas accomplished the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: Innumerable bodhisattvas, having fulfilled their aspirations for the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur to //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur to //
translated: attained manifest, complete enlightenment in unsurpassable, perfect buddhahood.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Samantadarśin said to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang @252b chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni bdag nyid che ba la rnam par spyod pa'o //🔽mtshungs pa ma mchis pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: byang @252b chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni bdag nyid che ba la rnam par spyod pa'o // mtshungs pa ma mchis pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: the bodhisattva Samantabhadra is one who practices in the great self,🔽one who practices in the incomparable,

original: yongs su mi chod pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su mi chod pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: one who practices in the unconditioned,

original: slar mi ldog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: slar mi ldog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: one who practices in the irreversible,

original: mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: one who practices in the realization of equality,

original: gzhan gyis mi zlog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //🔽chos thams cad tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi zlog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o // chos thams cad tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: one who practices in the unassailable,🔽one who practices in the non-differentiation of all phenomena,

original: chos thams cad dang ma 'dres par rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad dang ma 'dres par rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: one who practices in the unmixedness of all phenomena,

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi byin gyis rlabs mkhas pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi byin gyis rlabs mkhas pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: one who practices in the skill of blessing the minds of all beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos thams cad kyi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos thams cad kyi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva Samantabhadra is the one who practices the mastery of all phenomena, samādhi, and liberation.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun tu mig /
analyzed: kun tu mig /
translated: “Samantabhadra,

original: de khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: de khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni yon tan grangs med pas rnam par dag pa'o //🔽yon tan mtshungs pa med pas rnam par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni yon tan grangs med pas rnam par dag pa'o // yon tan mtshungs pa med pas rnam par brgyan pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva Samantabhadra is pure with innumerable qualities.🔽He is adorned with incomparable qualities.

original: yon tan tshad med pas rin po che dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan tshad med pas rin po che dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He possesses the jewels of immeasurable qualities.

original: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byung gnas rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byung gnas rgya mtsho'o //
translated: He is the ocean, the source of inconceivable qualities.

original: yon tan dpag tu med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yon tan dpag tu med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: He is the characteristic of immeasurable qualities.

original: yon tan mu med pa'i sprin to //
analyzed: yon tan mu med pa'i sprin to //

original: yon tan sa mtshams med pas bsngags shing bstod pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan sa mtshams med pas bsngags shing bstod pa'o //
translated: He is praised and extolled with boundless qualities.

original: chos rin po che zad mi shes @253a *//
analyzed: chos rin po che zad mi shes @253a *//

original: pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni /
analyzed: pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva Samantabhadra

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yon tan brjod cing bsngags pa mi zad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yon tan brjod cing bsngags pa mi zad pa'o //
translated: It is the inexhaustible praise and eulogy of all the qualities of the Buddhas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Lord said to the bodhisattva Samantabhadra:

analyzed: kun tu bzang po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad la / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bstan pa gang gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
translated: “Samantabhadra, you should teach to the bodhisattva Samantanetra and to the entire assembly of bodhisattvas🔽the ten concentrations of the bodhisattvas, which are possessed by the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who have perfected the conduct and vows of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra, and through which they are skilled in teaching the ten concentrations that have arisen, will arise, and are arising

original: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bcu shin tu bstan pa la mkhas pas /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bcu shin tu bstan pa la mkhas pas /
translated: in the past, future, and present, of the bodhisattvas.

original: ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po bcu shin tu bstan pa spobs par gyis shig /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po bcu shin tu bstan pa spobs par gyis shig /

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

translated: the “array of all buddhafields” samadhi,🔽the “unobstructed body” samadhi,🔽the “unobstructed mind” samadhi,🔽the “unobstructed body and mind” samadhi,

original: sems can gyi khams la dbang ba zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams la dbang ba zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: the “unobstructed body and mind of all beings” samadhi,🔽the “unobstructed body and mind of all beings in the three times” samadhi,🔽the “unobstructed body and mind of all beings in the three times and in the ten directions” samadhi,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa rab tu thob pa bcu pa chags pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa rab tu thob pa bcu pa chags pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba ste /
translated: the “unobstructed body and mind of all beings in the three times and in the ten directions, and which is the realm of the Dharma” samadhi,🔽the “unobstructed body and mind of all beings in the three times and in the ten directions, and which is the realm of the Dharma and the realm of space” samadhi,🔽and the “unobstructed body and mind of all beings in the three times and in the ten directions, and which is the realm of the Dharma and the realm of space, and which is the realm of the Dharma realm” samadhi.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po 'di bcu ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so //🔽gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po 'di bcu ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so // gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “These ten great bodhisattva samadhis have been taught by all the tathagatas of the past, will be taught by all the tathagatas of the future, and are being taught by all the tathagatas of the present.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag la bsten cing bsgoms te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag la bsten cing bsgoms te /
translated: “Any bodhisattva who relies on and cultivates these ten samadhis

original: mang du byas pa dang / dngos por byas pa dang / shes par byas pa dang / mngon du byas pa dang / mdun du byas pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / shin tu brtsams pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' @254a *//
analyzed: mang du byas pa dang / dngos por byas pa dang / shes par byas pa dang / mngon du byas pa dang / mdun du byas pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / shin tu brtsams pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' @254a *//
translated: They are the ones who have practiced a lot, who have made things real, who have understood, who have manifested, who have brought to the fore, who have meditated, and who have undertaken well.

original: yin yang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yin yang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
translated: They are also called bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: They are also called tathāgatas.

original: stobs bcu pa zhes bya'o //🔽'dren pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu pa zhes bya'o // 'dren pa zhes bya'o //
translated: They are also called those with the ten powers.🔽They are also called guides.

original: rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o //🔽thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o // thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
translated: They are also called leaders.🔽They are also called omniscient ones.

original: thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: They are also called all-seers.

original: chags pa med pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chags pa med pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: They are also called those who abide without attachment.

original: bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya'o //
translated: They are also called those whose sphere of activity is unobstructed.

original: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya'o //
translated: They are also called lords of all phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rjes su song ba yang yin la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rjes su song ba yang yin la /
translated: The bodhisattvas who have attained these concentrations have gone to all the world systems,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas phyir log pa yang yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas phyir log pa yang yin /
translated: and they have returned from all the world systems.

original: sems can thams cad kyi khams su rab tu song ba'ang yin la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi khams su rab tu song ba'ang yin la /
translated: They have gone to the realms of all sentient beings,

original: sems can med pa'i mtha' yang khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: sems can med pa'i mtha' yang khong du chud pa yin /
translated: and they have understood the limit of the absence of sentient beings.

original: chags pa med pa'i lus kyi snying po'i rjes su song ba'ang yin la /
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i lus kyi snying po'i rjes su song ba'ang yin la /
translated: They have gone to the essence of the body that is free of attachment,

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang 'jug par spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang 'jug par spyod pa yin no //
translated: and they have engaged in the experience of entering all the realms of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pas kyang rnam par dag la /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pas kyang rnam par dag la /
translated: They are pure because the realm of phenomena is without limit or center,

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang rjes su 'brang ba yin /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang rjes su 'brang ba yin /
translated: and they follow all the thus-gone ones of the past, present, and future.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rnam par mthong ba yang yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rnam par mthong ba yang yin la /
translated: They see the Dharma of all the thus-gone ones,🔽and they are skilled in the knowledge of the Dharma.

original: spyod pa thams cad kyi @254b yang rjes su song ba yin /
analyzed: spyod pa thams cad kyi @254b yang rjes su song ba yin /
translated: they follow all conduct.

original: dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / yi ge la rab tu spobs shing /
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / yi ge la rab tu spobs shing /
translated: They have eloquence in the branches of melodious speech and in the letters.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la'ang rab tu gnas pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la'ang rab tu gnas pa yin /
translated: They are pure because they have perfected all the bodhisattva activities, and they are established in the perfection of the divisions of the bodhisattva activities.

original: rtag par dus gsum skad cig tu zhugs pa'ang yin la /
analyzed: rtag par dus gsum skad cig tu zhugs pa'ang yin la /
translated: They are always engaged in the three times in an instant,

original: dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gzhol ba'ang yin /
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gzhol ba'ang yin /
translated: and they are dedicated to the understanding of all the three times.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ston pa'ang yin la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ston pa'ang yin la /
translated: They teach the Dharma of all the buddhas,

original: thabs kyis chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i lus dang yang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: thabs kyis chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i lus dang yang ldan pa yin /
translated: and they have a body that is never turned back from the turning of the wheel of the Dharma by means of methods.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i tshul la yang rab tu zhugs la /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i tshul la yang rab tu zhugs la /
translated: They are engaged in the way of perfect enlightenment of all bodhisattvas of the past, present, and future.

original: sangs rgyas gcig mngon par sangs rgyas pas sangs rgyas thams cad du'ang shin tu ston pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gcig mngon par sangs rgyas pas sangs rgyas thams cad du'ang shin tu ston pa yin te /
translated: And by the manifestation of a single buddha, all buddhas are manifested.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i tshul lo //
translated: These are the bodhisattvas’ ways of the Dharma.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul lo //
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul lo //
translated: These are the bodhisattvas’ ways of purifying wisdom.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhan gyis mi pham pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhan gyis mi pham pa'i tshul lo //
translated: These are the ways of the victory banner of omniscience that cannot be defeated by others.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi tshul lo /🔽byang chub sems @255a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi tshul lo / byang chub sems @255a *//
translated: These are the ways of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra’s conduct and aspirations.

original: dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnon po dang 'grogs pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnon po dang 'grogs pa'i tshul lo //
translated: These are the ways of the bodhisattvas’ superknowledges.

original: gzungs dang spobs pa thams cad kyi tshul lo //
analyzed: gzungs dang spobs pa thams cad kyi tshul lo //
translated: These are the ways of all dhāraṇīs and eloquence.

original: dus gsum tha mi dad pa'i tshul lo; ;'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul lo //
analyzed: dus gsum tha mi dad pa'i tshul lo; ;'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul lo //
translated: the way of the non-differentiation of the three times; the way of all the Buddhas of the past, present, and future;

original: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul lo //
translated: the way of establishing all beings in omniscience;

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan pa'i tshul lo //
translated: the way of the bodhisattvas’ demonstration of the power of supremacy in purifying all world-realms.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthu mi zad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs thob pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthu mi zad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs thob pa yin /
translated: “The bodhisattvas who have attained these bodhisattva liberations have attained the power of the realm of phenomena because of their inexhaustible power.

original: 'pho ba med pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa yin /
analyzed: 'pho ba med pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa yin /
translated: They are immeasurable like the realm of space because they have reached the ultimate non-transferable state.

original: chos kyi rgyal srid la 'gro ba dbang bskur ba'i phyir dbang mtha' yas par bsgyur ba yin /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal srid la 'gro ba dbang bskur ba'i phyir dbang mtha' yas par bsgyur ba yin /
translated: They have attained infinite power because they have been anointed as the rulers of the Dharma realm.

original: stobs bcu shin tu yangs pa'i tshul thob pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du tshad med pa'i ye shes thob pa yin /
analyzed: stobs bcu shin tu yangs pa'i tshul thob pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du tshad med pa'i ye shes thob pa yin /
translated: They have attained immeasurable wisdom in all worlds because they have attained the way of the ten powers.

original: rab tu zhi ba'i mtha' la zhugs pas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems rab tu bsgoms pa yin /
analyzed: rab tu zhi ba'i mtha' la zhugs pas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems rab tu bsgoms pa yin /
translated: They have cultivated the mind of non-affliction because they have entered the limit of peace.

original: shugs dang ldan pa'i rtsal ba dog pas snying rje chen po'i seng ge yin /
analyzed: shugs dang ldan pa'i rtsal ba dog pas snying rje chen po'i seng ge yin /
translated: They are lions of great compassion because they have the power of strength.

original: yon tan dang @255b bsngags pa thams cad dang ldan pas chos kyi sgron ma la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: yon tan dang @255b bsngags pa thams cad dang ldan pas chos kyi sgron ma la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi zad pa yin /
translated: They are the inexhaustible light of the Dharma because they have all good qualities and praise.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin /
translated: They are inconceivable to all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: chos shes shing khong du chud pas gnas kyi mthar phyin pa yin /
analyzed: chos shes shing khong du chud pas gnas kyi mthar phyin pa yin /
translated: They have reached the limit of the abode because they know and understand the Dharma.

original: spyod pa dang / rnam par gdags pa dang / brda thams cad la sna tshogs su shin tu bstan pa byed par mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: spyod pa dang / rnam par gdags pa dang / brda thams cad la sna tshogs su shin tu bstan pa byed par mkhas pa yin /
translated: They are skilled in teaching the various designations, conventions, and conduct.

original: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mkhas pa la zhugs pas mtshan ma med pa la mos pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mkhas pa la zhugs pas mtshan ma med pa la mos pa yin /
translated: They are interested in the absence of characteristics, because they are skilled in the absence of characteristics of all phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen pos rnam par dag pas rigs dang rgyud rnam par dag pa yin /

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi lus ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o //

analyzed: cu rtsa brgyad pa des sngon gyi lus 'jig par mi byed do //
translated: That lord of the asuras, Rāhu, with that emanated body of six hundred and eighty thousand leagues, does not destroy his previous body.

original: sngon skyes pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro; ;lus chen po de yod pas kyang sprul pa'i lus la gzhan du 'du shes par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngon skyes pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro; ;lus chen po de yod pas kyang sprul pa'i lus la gzhan du 'du shes par mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: sprul pa'i lus des mthu dang dbang byed par dbang sgyur bar yang yang dag par ston pa na rmongs shing 'khrul bar 'gyur ba'ang med de /

analyzed: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de ni / 'dod chags can /

analyzed: rgya mtsho'i nang gi khyim na 'dug bzhin du rnam pa de lta bu'i sprul pa'i lus kyis mngon par 'phags na /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu rtogs pa 'jig rten thams cad na dpe med pa mig yor dang mnyam par rab tu zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas skyes pa'i sprul pa rnam par dmigs
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu rtogs pa 'jig rten thams cad na dpe med pa mig yor dang mnyam par rab tu zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas skyes pa'i sprul pa rnam par dmigs
translated: “The bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarva­rūpa­saṃdarśana, who has the realization of all phenomena being like illusions, who is without peer in all worlds, who has entered the sameness of optical illusions, who has realized that all world realms are like the emanations of the birth of buddhas,

analyzed: pa lta bur khong du chud pa sgra dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa thams cad ri'i brag ca lta bur @259b shes pa yang dag pa'i chos rab tu mthong ba /

original: chos ji lta ba bzhin gyi lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos ji lta ba bzhin gyi lus dang ldan pa /

analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing dang ba'i chos la zhugs pa /

analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa /

analyzed: lus kyi yul tshad med pa la gnas pa /
translated: who dwells in the immeasurable domain of the body,

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes snang bas byang chub kyi spyod pa rnam par sbyangs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te; de ting nge 'dzin chen po de la gnas pas cung zad du 'khrul pa'ang med na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes snang bas byang chub kyi spyod pa rnam par sbyangs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te; de ting nge 'dzin chen po de la gnas pas cung zad du 'khrul pa'ang med na /
translated: If he is not even slightly confused while dwelling in that great samādhi,

original: blong zhing rmongs par 'gyur ba med pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: blong zhing rmongs par 'gyur ba med pa lta ci smos /

original: de lus kyi stod lha'i 'jig rten du 'phags par byin gyis rlob cing lus kyi smad 'dod pa'i khams na 'dug par byin gyis rlob kyang shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po des /

original: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de yang rang gi lus kyi nang du rlag pa des lus chen po ston cing spyoms pa'i skye ba dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang lus kyi nang du rlag par byin gyis rlob bo //

translated: He also blessed the body of the asura lord Rāhu to be destroyed within his own body, and he blessed him to display and increase his great body and to destroy all his magical powers within his own body.

original: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

analyzed: dper na / mi sdug pa bsgoms pa la gnas pa'i dge slong ni mi sdug pa'i mtshan mar rnam par lta zhing; nang gi lus la rtog pa la mngon par brtson pa yin / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad @260a *// chud par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: chos kyi lus la brtag par mngon par brtson pa yin te /

analyzed: lus de la 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten gyi chos mthong yang 'di lta ste /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas lus la 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyis chags pa med do //

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
