translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ samādhi called the light of the wisdom that goes with the skill in the vast.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re la byin gyis rlob
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re la byin gyis rlob
translated: “Moreover, O jinaputras, the bodhisattva great beings, with as many worlds as there are atoms in three-billion-fold worlds, bless each of those worlds.

analyzed: ste / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re yang lus rnam par dmigs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par ston to //

translated: And from each of those bodies, he radiates as many circles of light rays as there are atoms in the great trichiliocosm.🔽And each of those light rays displays as many colors as there are atoms in the great trichiliocosm.

original: kha dog de dag re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar byed do //

translated: And each of those colors illuminates as many world systems as there are atoms in the great trichiliocosm.

original: snang ba de dag re res kyang sems can stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par byed do //

analyzed: de la yang byang chub sems dpa' des 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu shes so //
translated: And the bodhisattva knows those world systems.

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rab tu shes so //

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa rab tu shes so //

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'gro ba'ang rab tu shes so //

analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams la de ltar 'jug kyang /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pas 'jig rten gyi khams spro bar yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not make the world-realms into something that is an object of perception, nor does he make the world-realms into something that is a mental object.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par mi byed do ////🔽@261a *// bam po lnga bcu drug pa /
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par mi byed do //// @261a *// bam po lnga bcu drug pa /
translated: And the nature of phenomena does not destroy the world systems.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

analyzed: ri bdun po de dag la shar nas ri mtshams kyi gnas bdun po shin tu rub pa de dag tu'ang snang ba'i tshul gyis kun tu 'char ro //

analyzed: ri mtshams bdun po de dag kyang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas /

analyzed: de ltar na gcig gis gcig snang bar bya ba'i tshul du ri mtshams de dag tu nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan shar cing /

analyzed: rin po che'i ri de dag la nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan 'byung bas /

analyzed: de'i phyir rin po che'i ri rnams las nyi ma 'char zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the sun rises from the precious mountains.

analyzed: de ltar gcig nas gcig tu snang ba rnam par dmigs pa brgyud pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa med de /
translated: Thus, the continuum of the perception of one after another is endless up to the orb of the sun.

analyzed: de ltar snang ba yang dngos po yang ma yin / dngos @261b po ma yin pa yang ma yin / yod pa yang ma yin /

analyzed: nang du phyin pa yang ma yin /

analyzed: phyi rol na gnas pa yang ma yin /

analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva great being

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa 'jig par yang mi byed do //
translated: who abides in this bodhisattva absorption does not destroy the perception of the world systems,

original: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yongs su mi spong ngo //🔽byang chub sems dpa' de nyid 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nang du phyin pa'ang ma yin no //🔽byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par dmigs pa'i phyi rol na 'dug pa'ang ma yin no; ;byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams la yang mi rtog ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yongs su mi spong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de nyid 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nang du phyin pa'ang ma yin no // byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par dmigs pa'i phyi rol na 'dug pa'ang ma yin no; ;byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams la yang mi rtog ste /
translated: but he does not abandon the nature of phenomena.🔽That bodhisattva does not go inside the world systems,🔽and that bodhisattva does not remain outside the perception of the world systems. That bodhisattva does not conceptualize the world systems,

analyzed: sgyu ma'i nyi ma des mun pa'i grangs su bya ba 'di dag bsal bar yang mi 'gyur ro //

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yul la zhing du 'jug pa'ang byed /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yul la zhing du 'jug pa'ang byed /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva, while engaging with the field of the buddha-land,

original: 'jig rten ma yin pa'i yul la 'jig rten yang rab tu shes /
analyzed: 'jig rten ma yin pa'i yul la 'jig rten yang rab tu shes /
translated: also knows the world in the field of the supramundane.

original: gzugs med pa'i yul la gzugs su byin gyis rlob pa yang shin tu ston te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i yul la gzugs su byin gyis rlob pa yang shin tu ston te /
translated: He also manifests the consecration of form in the formless field.

original: gcig gis gnyis pa 'jig par mi byed do //
analyzed: gcig gis gnyis pa 'jig par mi byed do //
translated: One does not destroy the other.

original: gnyis pas kyang gcig 'jig par mi byed do //🔽de ni des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad sgyu ma'i dra bar chos kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas rab tu shes shing /
analyzed: gnyis pas kyang gcig 'jig par mi byed do // de ni des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad sgyu ma'i dra bar chos kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas rab tu shes shing /
translated: Nor does the other destroy the one.🔽He knows and understands that all mundane phenomena are the magical net, and he enters into the nature of phenomena.

original: khong du chud pa dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa @265a *//
analyzed: khong du chud pa dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa @265a *//
translated: He enters into the nature of wisdom.

original: dang; las kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas khong du chud pa dang / las kyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rab tu bsgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin du las thams cad rab tu spyod pas de'i phyir rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dang; las kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas khong du chud pa dang / las kyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rab tu bsgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin du las thams cad rab tu spyod pas de'i phyir rab tu shes so //
translated: They understand the nature of karma by engaging with it. They establish the nature of karma as the nature of wisdom. And they engage with all karmic actions through the nature of wisdom.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i mkhan po de ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ston na sa med par yongs su ston pa ma yin /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i mkhan po de ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ston na sa med par yongs su ston pa ma yin /
translated: when a magician displays an illusion, he does not display it without a basis.

original: skye bo'i tshogs sna tshogs med par yongs su ston pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: skye bo'i tshogs sna tshogs med par yongs su ston pa yang ma yin no //
translated: He does not display it without a variety of people.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin med par 'jig rten thams cad la yongs su 'jug pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin med par 'jig rten thams cad la yongs su 'jug pa'ang ma yin /
translated: In the same way, a bodhisattva does not engage with the whole world without the nature of space.

original: 'jig rten gyi rnam pa med par nam mkha'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rnam pa med par nam mkha'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: And he does not engage with the nature of space without the aspects of the world.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin yang 'jig rten dang tha mi dad /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin yang 'jig rten dang tha mi dad /
translated: The nature of space is not different from the world.

original: 'jig rten gyi rnam pa yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang tha mi dad de /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rnam pa yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang tha mi dad de /
translated: The aspects of the world are not different from the nature of space.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'jig rten gyi yul dang / las sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'jig rten gyi yul dang / las sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la rab tu 'jug go /
translated: The bodhisattva enters into the various adornments of the various objects and actions of the world in that nature of space.

original: mngon par sgrub bo //🔽yang dag par lta'o //
analyzed: mngon par sgrub bo // yang dag par lta'o //
translated: He accomplishes them.🔽He sees them correctly.

original: rnam par lta'o //🔽khong du chud par byed do; ;rtog par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par lta'o // khong du chud par byed do; ;rtog par byed do //
translated: He observes them.🔽He understands them.🔽He conceives of them.

original: goms par byed do //🔽rjes su sgom mo //🔽rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: goms par byed do // rjes su sgom mo // rab tu rtog go /
translated: He cultivates them.🔽He reflects on them.

original: rnam par dpyod do //
analyzed: rnam par dpyod do //
translated: He analyzes them.

original: sems skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i @265b 'jig pa dang / 'du ba'i rnam pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i @265b 'jig pa dang / 'du ba'i rnam pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: In a single instant he knows the destruction and formation of innumerable world systems.

original: bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rnam pa la brtson par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rnam pa la brtson par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows how to apply himself to the aspects of the succession of eons.

original: skad cig gcig gis bskal pa de dag gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i dus thams cad dbang du byed do //
analyzed: skad cig gcig gis bskal pa de dag gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i dus thams cad dbang du byed do //
translated: In a single instant he controls all the times of the succession of those eons.

original: sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa dang / dus rnam par dmigs pas mang du byed pa de yang lus las gzhan du mi byed de /
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa dang / dus rnam par dmigs pas mang du byed pa de yang lus las gzhan du mi byed de /
translated: In each instant of mind, they manifest many eons and times without leaving their bodies.

original: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu slob cing yongs su grub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang / 'jig rten sgyu ma'i grangs kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /
analyzed: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu slob cing yongs su grub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang / 'jig rten sgyu ma'i grangs kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /
translated: In this way, they train in the bodhisattvas’ illusion-like accomplishment of the inconceivable wisdom of the tathagatas, and they perfect the illusion-like wisdom of the tathagatas, the illusion-like enumeration of the worlds,

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'gal ba med pa'i ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang / dus gsum sgyu ma tha mi dad par khong du chud pa dang / mngon par shes pa sgyu ma nges par rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'gal ba med pa'i ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang / dus gsum sgyu ma tha mi dad par khong du chud pa dang / mngon par shes pa sgyu ma nges par rtogs pa dang /
translated: the illusion-like realization of all phenomena, the illusion-like wisdom that does not contradict the world, the illusion-like understanding of the three times, and the illusion-like realization of the superknowledges.

original: sems sgyu ma mtha' yas shing mu med pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du yang dag par mos par byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems sgyu ma mtha' yas shing mu med pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du yang dag par mos par byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: They are immersed in the infinite and limitless illusions of mind, and they are convinced that all buddhas are of the nature of illusion.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rab tu 'jug cing rnam par spyod kyang thams cad du chags pa med de /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rab tu 'jug cing rnam par spyod kyang thams cad du chags pa med de /
translated: Thus, although bodhisattvas engage with and experience all world systems, they are not attached to anything.

original: kun @266a *// la'ang rlom sems med do //
analyzed: kun @266a *// la'ang rlom sems med do //
translated: They are not conceited about anything.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma byed pa ni mig 'phrul dang / sgyu ma thams cad ston kyang yongs su ston pa yang med do /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma byed pa ni mig 'phrul dang / sgyu ma thams cad ston kyang yongs su ston pa yang med do /
translated: It is like this:

original: de la rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, a magician may display all kinds of magical illusions and tricks, but he is not attached to them and is not confused about them.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i pha rol tu'ang phyin la chos la zhugs pas rlom ba yang med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i pha rol tu'ang phyin la chos la zhugs pas rlom ba yang med do //
translated: bodhisattvas have perfected the engagement with all phenomena, but they are not conceited about engaging with phenomena.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second bodhisattva great beings’ pleasant wisdom of expertise in the vast samādhi called ‘the great cloud.’

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag /
translated: furthermore, bodhisattva great beings🔽in the eastern direction enter into the samādhi called ‘following the succession of the endless buddha realms.’

original: shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'das shing der sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go ;'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed 'das
analyzed: shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'das shing der sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go ;'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed 'das
translated: They enter into this samādhi and, in the same way that they have passed through as many buddha realms as there are atoms in an endless number of world systems,

original: pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas /🔽'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang 'jig rten gyi khams la lar nyi ma rangs par snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang 'jig rten gyi khams la lar nyi ma rangs par snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: they pass through as many world systems as there are atoms in an endless number of buddha realms.🔽In some of those world systems, they enter into samādhi for an entire day.

original: la lar snga dro'i dus /
analyzed: la lar snga dro'i dus /
translated: In some, they enter into samādhi for a morning.

original: la lar nyi ma gung gi dus /
analyzed: la lar nyi ma gung gi dus /
translated: For some, it is midday.

original: la lar phyi dro'i dus /
analyzed: la lar phyi dro'i dus /
translated: For some, it is afternoon.

original: la lar snga @266b dro'i thun gyi dus /🔽la lar nyi ma gung gi thun gyi dus /
analyzed: la lar snga @266b dro'i thun gyi dus / la lar nyi ma gung gi thun gyi dus /
translated: For some, it is the first part of the morning.🔽For some, it is the midday period.

original: la lar phyi dro'i thun gyi dus /🔽la lar skad cig gcig gi dus /🔽la lar yud tsam gcig gi dus /
analyzed: la lar phyi dro'i thun gyi dus / la lar skad cig gcig gi dus / la lar yud tsam gcig gi dus /
translated: For some, it is the afternoon period.🔽For some, it is the time of a single instant.🔽For some, it is the time of a single moment.

original: la lar thang gcig gi dus /🔽la lar srod kyi dus /
analyzed: la lar thang gcig gi dus / la lar srod kyi dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of a single second.🔽For some, it is the time of dusk.

original: la lar yud du yan man gyi dus /🔽la lar zla ba gcig gi dus /
analyzed: la lar yud du yan man gyi dus / la lar zla ba gcig gi dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of a short while.🔽For some, it is the time of a month.

original: la lar lo'i dus /🔽la lar lo brgya stong gi dus /🔽la lar lo bye pa brgya stong gi dus /
analyzed: la lar lo'i dus / la lar lo brgya stong gi dus / la lar lo bye pa brgya stong gi dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of a year.🔽For some, it is the time of a hundred or a thousand years.🔽For some, it is the time of a hundred thousand years.

original: la lar lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus /
analyzed: la lar lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of a hundred thousand quintillion years.

original: la lar bskal pa gcig gi dus /🔽la lar bskal pa brgya'i dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa gcig gi dus / la lar bskal pa brgya'i dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of a single eon.🔽For some, it is the time of a hundred eons.

original: la lar bskal pa stong gi dus /🔽la lar bskal pa brgya phrag stong gi dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa stong gi dus / la lar bskal pa brgya phrag stong gi dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of a thousand eons.🔽For some, it is the time of a hundred thousand eons.

original: la lar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of a hundred thousand quintillion eons.

original: la lar bskal pa tshad med pa'i dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa tshad med pa'i dus /
translated: For some, it is the time of countless eons.

original: la lar bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i dus; la lar bskal pa mu med pa'i dus /🔽la lar bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i dus; la lar bskal pa mu med pa'i dus / la lar bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i dus /
translated: some for an endless eon,🔽some for an infinite eon,

original: la lar bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus /
translated: some for an incalculable eon,

original: la lar bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus /🔽la lar bskal pa gzhal du med pa'i dus /🔽la lar bskal pa bgrang du med pa'i dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus / la lar bskal pa gzhal du med pa'i dus / la lar bskal pa bgrang du med pa'i dus /
translated: some for an inconceivable eon,🔽some for an immeasurable eon,🔽some for an inexpressible eon,

original: la lar bskal pa sa mtshams med pa'i dus /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa sa mtshams med pa'i dus /
translated: some for an eon without interruption,

original: la lar bskal pa brjod du med pa'i dus su snyoms par 'jug kyang /
analyzed: la lar bskal pa brjod du med pa'i dus su snyoms par 'jug kyang /
translated: and some for an eon without end.

original: byang chub sems dpa' des chos sgyu ma de dag ring du gnas par sems par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dus gzhan du rjes @267a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' des chos sgyu ma de dag ring du gnas par sems par mi 'gyur ro // dus gzhan du rjes @267a *//
translated: But the bodhisattva does not think that those illusory phenomena will last long.

original: su 'brang bar yang mi sems te /
analyzed: su 'brang bar yang mi sems te /
translated: He does not think that they will continue into another time.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dus rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs de dag la mngon par chags par yang mi byed do //🔽mngon / par zhen pa yang mi byed do //🔽dbang du yang mi byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dus rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs de dag la mngon par chags par yang mi byed do // mngon / par zhen pa yang mi byed do // dbang du yang mi byed do //
translated: The bodhisattva does not become attached to those various different times.🔽He does not become fixated on them.

original: mi rtog go /
analyzed: mi rtog go /
translated: He does not bring them under his control.🔽He does not conceptualize them.

original: rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: He is free from conceptualization.

original: chos thams cad la nyams pa med par gzhol bas byams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad la nyams pa med par gzhol bas byams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with the supernormal knowledge of love, because he is dedicated to the non-decline of all beings.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pas ldan pa yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pas ldan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with the supernormal knowledge of concentration, because he is dedicated to the non-decline of all beings.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / lha'i bu nyi ma ni nyin par snang bar byed cing 'gro yang nyin par dang yang 'grogs pa med /
analyzed: dper na / lha'i bu nyi ma ni nyin par snang bar byed cing 'gro yang nyin par dang yang 'grogs pa med /
translated: For example, the son of the gods, the sun, shines during the day and moves, but it is not accompanied by the day,

original: mtshan mo dang yang mi 'grogs so //
analyzed: mtshan mo dang yang mi 'grogs so //
translated: and it is not accompanied by the night.

original: 'gro ba'i tshe yang nyin mor snang la /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i tshe yang nyin mor snang la /
translated: When it moves, it shines during the day,

original: nub nas kyang mtshan mor snang ngo //
analyzed: nub nas kyang mtshan mor snang ngo //
translated: and when it sets, it shines during the night.

original: 'on kyang nyin par yang skyed pa med la /
analyzed: 'on kyang nyin par yang skyed pa med la /
translated: However, it is not produced during the day,

original: mtshan mo yang bshig pa med do //
analyzed: mtshan mo yang bshig pa med do //
translated: and it is not destroyed during the night.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu snyoms par zhugs shing grangs su brjod pas rnam par ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu snyoms par zhugs shing grangs su brjod pas rnam par ston to //
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva enters into countless world systems and manifests through enumeration.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhing 'byams klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhing 'byams klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ third Dharma realm, called the wisdom of skill in the vast samādhis of the bodhisattva great beings, which is connected to one after another of the infinite fields.

original: kye; @267b rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; @267b rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: Moreover, bodhisattva great beings

original: sems can gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par mos par byed de /
analyzed: sems can gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par mos par byed de /
translated: have the aspiration that the bodies of sentient beings are the body of the Buddha.

original: des de bzhin gshegs ba shin tu mang pos mthong bas /
analyzed: des de bzhin gshegs ba shin tu mang pos mthong bas /
translated: Through that, they see a great many thus-gone ones

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la spos kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la spos kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
translated: and make offerings to those thus-gone ones, as numerous as the atoms in countless world systems, with all the best kinds of incense.

original: me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
translated: They make offerings with all the most beautiful kinds of flowers.

original: zhing yangs pa'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa byed do //
analyzed: zhing yangs pa'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa byed do //
translated: They make offerings with the forms of vast realms, as numerous as the atoms in countless buddha-fields.

original: rgyan gyi rnam pa 'gro ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
analyzed: rgyan gyi rnam pa 'gro ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
translated: They make offerings with the forms of adornments that surpass all worlds.

analyzed: ba dang / mchod pa'i rnam par gtogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i tshul dang ldan par mchod pa byed do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rab tu 'dzin to //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyang khong du chud par byed do //

original: de bzhin nyid la yang yang dag par 'jug pas rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la yang yang dag par 'jug pas rab tu 'jug go /

analyzed: chags pa med pa'i stobs rab tu spel ba la'ang mngon par mos shing /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'thob par byed do //

analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

analyzed: dper na / g-yeng ba'i sems kyis yul rnam par dmigs pa ni /

analyzed: gzugs las kyang ma byung /

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: 'byung bar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'da' pa'i tshe yang 'jig par mi dmigs so //

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: mi dge ba yang ma yin / dang ba yang ma yin /

original: @269a *// kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: @269a *// kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos blangs pa rnams kyang yang dag par 'dzin to //

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes bzhi pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du 'das pa'i bskal pa rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so //

analyzed: de bzhin du 'das pa'i chos rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so //

analyzed: @270b de bzhin du 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so //
